meanings.definition: Relating to the study of cells.
meanings.sent1: The cytological research focused on understanding cell structures.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use cytological techniques to investigate cell properties.
meanings.sent3: The cytological investigation revealed the hidden secrets of the cell world.
meanings.sent4: Her cytological expertise allowed her to see the microscopic universe within cells.
meanings.sent5: Through cytological analysis, the intricate beauty of cells was unveiled.

meanings.definition: Involving the examination of cellular structures.
meanings.sent1: The cytological examination revealed abnormalities in the cell structure.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use cytological tests to diagnose cell-related diseases.
meanings.sent3: The cytological inspection of the cell was like solving a tiny puzzle.
meanings.sent4: His cytological scrutiny uncovered the delicate architecture of the cell.
meanings.sent5: The cytological study provided a detailed view of the cell's inner workings.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the branch of biology that deals with the structure and function of cells.
meanings.sent1: Cytological biology explores the functions of different cell types.
meanings.sent2: The cytological aspect of biology focuses on cellular processes.
meanings.sent3: The cytological side of biology class was both fascinating and challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her cytological research shed light on the complexities of cell functions.
meanings.sent5: Studying cytological biology helps us understand the building blocks of life.
